function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Impacts of COVID-19 on construction stakeholders","Impact":"Potential disruption to construction projects and stakeholder well-being","Mitigation":"Implementing safety protocols, remote work options, and support for affected stakeholders","Technologies":"Remote collaboration tools, health monitoring technology, and contact tracing apps","People":"Construction workers, engineers, managers, suppliers, subcontractors","Owner":"Construction companies, project teams, public policymakers"}]}
